relation.text: Wednesday Octber . 8 th - where we are stop
came to Spa & from thence embarkd on the Rhine & were four days
the next day at Manheim where the Electreſs is at present , & the day after at Ogersheim when he is in the Country -- Sr Wm . accepted
set out in pursuance of our Plan of being at Manheim by the 4 th - of Novr . -- & the day before Yesterday
